stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Experience the ultimate SRE event in London on 14-15 September! With two days packed with over 50+ talks from industry-leading professionals. Book your early bird tickets before they're gone!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Experience the ultimate SRE event in London on 14-15 September! With two days packed with over 50+ talks from industry-leading professionals. Book your early bird tickets before they're gone! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: gravityLab: No gravity, no problem
stories.Description: The startup keeps making progress in space research with the development of a spacecraft equipped with "programmable gravity." The project plans to ensure humanity's long-term presence in space.
stories.Tweet: gravityLab: No gravity, no problem 📦 The startup keeps making progress in space research with the development of a spacecraft equipped with "programmable gravity." The project plans to ensure humanity's long-term presence in space. #rocketscience https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/28/gravitylab-wants-to-tackle-the-artificial-gravity-problem/

stories.Title: Competing for the AI throne
stories.Description: Intel's CEO Pat Gelsinger has shared an ambitious vision for AI integration, aiming to make it a key element of everything the company offers. Can they thrive amidst intense competition?
stories.Tweet: Competing for the AI throne 📦 Intel's CEO Pat Gelsinger has shared an ambitious vision for AI integration, aiming to make it a key element of everything the company offers. Can they thrive amidst intense competition? #intel https://www.techtimes.com/articles/294390/20230728/intel-ceo-reveals-ambitious-plan-integrate-ai-across-platforms.htm

stories.Title: From data to robotic action
stories.Description: Google DeepMind has unveiled RT-2, a groundbreaking vision-language-action model that enables robots to learn from web data and directly output robotic actions.
stories.Tweet: From data to robotic action 📦 Google DeepMind has unveiled RT-2, a groundbreaking vision-language-action model that enables robots to learn from web data and directly output robotic actions. #google https://www.deepmind.com/blog/rt-2-new-model-translates-vision-and-language-into-action?utm_source=keywordblog&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=rt2

stories.Title: AWS doubles down on generative AI
stories.Description: Bedrock's new native agent capabilities enhance generative AI applications. Developers can now complete tasks with ease, using a simple API to connect foundation models to data sources securely.
stories.Tweet: AWS doubles down on generative AI 📦 Bedrock's new native agent capabilities enhance generative AI applications. Developers can now complete tasks with ease, using a simple API to connect foundation models to data sources securely. #amazon https://venturebeat.com/ai/amazon-grows-generative-ai-efforts-with-bedrock-expansion-for-aws/

stories.Title: Experience news in a new way
stories.Description: Artifact, created by Instagram's co-founders, now offers an AI text-to-speech feature. Over 30 English voices, including celebrity ones, can read news articles for you.
stories.Tweet: Experience news in a new way 📦 Artifact, created by Instagram's co-founders, now offers an AI text-to-speech feature. Over 30 English voices, including celebrity ones, can read news articles for you. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/27/23810160/artifact-ai-text-to-speech-read-news-snoop-dogg-gwyneth-paltrow-speechify

stories.Title: No more range anxiety
stories.Description: Swiss startup Tera Technologies brings innovation to the electric car market with the MiracleONE. Extra batteries in the trunk provide an ingenious solution to on-the-go charging.
stories.Tweet: No more range anxiety 📦 Swiss startup Tera Technologies brings innovation to the electric car market with the MiracleONE. Extra batteries in the trunk provide an ingenious solution to on-the-go charging. #EVs https://www.fastcompany.com/90928813/low-cost-electric-vehicle-extra-batteries-plug-into-a-regular-outlet

stories.Title: Tesla plays dress up
stories.Description: Cybertruck's latest prototype sports an intriguing Ford F-150 disguise. Is Tesla hiding the final design or is it just a creative move to spark discussion?
stories.Tweet: Tesla plays dress up 📦 Cybertruck's latest prototype sports an intriguing Ford F-150 disguise. Is Tesla hiding the final design or is it just a creative move to spark discussion? #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/07/27/closer-look-tesla-strange-cybertruck-ford-f-150-wrap/

stories.Title: Watch out, Vision Pro!
stories.Description: Samsung's upcoming XR headset and ecosystem are set to challenge Apple's Vision Pro. President TM Roh confirms that an announcement is just around the corner.
stories.Tweet: Watch out, Vision Pro! 📦 Samsung's upcoming XR headset and ecosystem are set to challenge Apple's Vision Pro. stories.Title: Great news for space enthusiasts!
stories.Description: NASA is introducing its new streaming service, NASA+, which promises ad-free access to live coverage and original space-related content. Early access to the beta website is now open!
stories.Tweet: Great news for space enthusiasts! 📦 NASA is introducing its new streaming service, NASA+, which promises ad-free access to live coverage and original space-related content. Early access to the beta website is now open! #NASA https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/nasa-trailer-for-streaming-service/

stories.Title: Strengthening user privacy
stories.Description: Google enhances privacy features with "Unknown Tracker Alerts" for Android, which protects users against potential tracking devices like Apple AirTags.
stories.Tweet: Strengthening user privacy 📦 Google enhances privacy features with "Unknown Tracker Alerts" for Android, which protects users against potential tracking devices like Apple AirTags. #android https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/android-phones-can-now-tell-you-if-theres-an-airtag-following-you/

stories.Title: Goodbye texting, hello videos
stories.Description: WhatsApp adds a new dimension to chat with its latest feature: instant video messages. Share up to 1-minute video clips effortlessly, similar to Telegram.
stories.Tweet: Goodbye texting, hello videos 📦 WhatsApp adds a new dimension to chat with its latest feature: instant video messages. Share up to 1-minute video clips effortlessly, similar to Telegram. #whatsapp https://www.engadget.com/whatsapp-adds-telegram-style-video-messages-141005605.html

title: AI everywhere for Intel, DeepMind announces RT-2, Cybertruck gets a disguise
description: The Cybertrack disguised as a Ford F-150 is the circle of life doing a full… circle. Looking forward to the Cybertrack mini cooper disguise.
